name: Geocide
description:
This game is a submission for GeoJam 2022 Game Jam where the theme was "Pick A Side".  Find this game's submission page here:

https://itch.io/jam/geojam-2022/rate/1592242

Survive as long as possible while side scrolling and shooting the shape eating enemies!  Just be sure to pick the right side before you engage!

Controls:

Gamepad and Mouse + Keyboard Compatible!

Move Up/Down: Left Stick/D-Pad; WS/Up Down Arrows

Rotate: LB/L1/RB/R1/Left Stick/D-Pad; AD/Left Right Arrows

Shoot: RT/A/X; Space/LMB

Credit:

Music - Battle of Pogs: Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
